abilities.name: Tesla Cannon
abilities.description: Winston`s weapon fires a short-range electric barrage for as long as he holds down the trigger. Ignores armor damage reduction. Cannot headshot.

abilities.name: Tesla Cannon (Alt Fire)
abilities.description: Winston's weapon charges up then fires a medium-range electric beam. Ignores armor damage reduction. Cannot headshot.

abilities.name: Jump Pack
abilities.description: Assisted by his energy pack, Winston lunges through the air, dealing damage and staggering nearby enemies when he lands.

abilities.name: Barrier Projector
abilities.description: Winston's barrier projector extends a bubble-shaped field that absorbs damage until it's destroyed. Allies protected by the barrier can return fire from within it.

abilities.name: Primal Rage
abilities.description: Winston embraces his animal nature, significantly boosting his health and making him very difficult to kill, strengthening his melee attack, and allowing him to use his Jump Pack ability more frequently. While raging, Winston can only make melee and Jump Pack attacks.
